realm.name: data-scientists
realm.description: Explore datasets and deploy Kubernetes apps and jobs.

realm.name: validated_user
realm.description: The user has been validated by an admin. It is a prerequisite for the first login.

passwordPolicy: length(8) and notUsername(undefined) and notEmail(undefined) and lowerCase(1) and digits(1)

clientScopes.name: service_account
clientScopes.description: Specific scope for a client enabled for service accounts

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: basic
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add all basic claims to the token

kc.user.profile.config: {"attributes":[{"name":"username","displayName":"${username}","validations":{"length":{"min":"3","max":"24","trim-disabled":"false"},"pattern":{"pattern":"^[0-9a-z][0-9a-z-]+[0-9a-z]$","error-message":"The length must be 3-24 characters, and must contain only lowercase alphanumeric characters or '-'. You will not be able to change it later and short is usually roles","validations":{"options":{"options":["authorized-technical-data-manager","clinical-staff","dataset-administrator","data-scientists","application-developer"]}},"annotations":{"inputOptionLabels":{"authorized-technical-data-manager":"[Data ingester]: Ingest (manually or in-bulk) new patient cases (images or clinical data)","clinical-staff":"[Clinical staff]: Use or validate images, data or models in clinical environment","dataset-administrator":"[Dataset manager]: Create and manage datasets","data-scientists":"[Data scientist]: Run applications in the platform using datasets to develop and train AI models/tools","application-developer":"[Application developer]: Develop applications for the platform"},"inputType":"multiselect-checkboxes","inputHelperTextBefore":"What are you going to do in that projects?"},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"group":"project-member","multivalued":true},{"name":"eucaimNegotiationID","displayName":"EUCAIM negotiation can include here any additional comment related to your access request.","validations":{},"annotations":{"inputHelperTextAfter":"After your registration, your account must be validated according to
